title: A fruit seller bought 6 dozens of apple at Rs. 50 per dozen. He found that 6 apples were rotten. At what rate does he need to sell the rest to make a 10% profit? - Quora

response.answer_text: At Rs. 50 per dozen, he paid Rs. 300 for 6 dozen apples. To make a profit of 10%, he should receive Rs. 330. Now, since half a dozen (6) apple are rotten, he should get the above amount with 5.5 dozens. So he should sell at (330/5.5) per dozen. That is Rs. 60 per dozen.
